PROGRAMMES/COURSES AVAILABLE AT THE NIGERIA CERTIFICATE IN EDUCATION (NCE) LEVEL AND THE REQUIREMENTS FOR EACH 
COURSE  
COLLEGE/COURSE  COURSE REQUIREMENTS  UTME SUBJECTS  
 MINNA

 ZUBA        
  
HAUSA/IGBO L2  
 ASSCOED

 FC-KAT       
 KANO               
OTTO/IJANIKIN   
 ZUBA    
    
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Hausa and any other two (2) Arts 
subjects.  
  
Hausa and other two (2) ((2) Arts subjects.  
  
HAUSA/SOCIAL STUDIES  
 ADEYEMI      
AICOEP  
 ALVAN       
 ANKPA       
ANISE  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language,  
Mathematics, Hausa and any two (2) of  
1. Geography  
2. History/Government  
3. Islamic Studies/Christian Religious Studies  
4. Economics  
  
  
Hausa and any other two (2) Arts/Social Science 
subjects.
